content.body:
Hi @room we are back in 10 min TC39/JavaScript tools discussion

Video call link: https://meet.google.com/iqb-pdpn-evh
Or dial: ‪(US) +1 260-638-0323‬ PIN: ‪526 486 488‬#
Agenda : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1RlnAnMa4QzQUK_tNOHdWfnske2X9KZ_e90VBG-DWqUo/edit

Thank you for re-initiating the tooling discussions.

Regarding getting more tooling authors involved - what kind of invitation should we send out and ask around?
I'm super new to all these processes, so is still getting acquainted.
I visit time to time and onboard people to the meeting invite
maybe should make it more official

Making things more official would be great! 

As a new comber to tooling, I really wished a place where I can ask around and seek for implementation alignments. Even a formal place where we could document implementation differences.
Another example: I really wish for all toolings to deprecate the `browser` field https://github.com/defunctzombie/package-browser-field-spec
content.formatted_body: Another example: I really wish for all toolings to deprecate the browser field https://github.com/defunctzombie/package-browser-field-spec
